Germany.Description: The international bachelor International Management program from University of Applied Sciences Würzburg-Schweinfurt prepares students for a career in an international business environment in Germany or abroad.

Sustainable design and construction has become a key objective that is gaining more and more importance internationally. The bachelor's degree program International Civil Engineering at Mainz University of Applied Sciences takes up this structural change in the construction sector. We provide broad knowledge in the areas of civil engineering, construction operations and construction management.
The Bachelor's degree program in International Management from Karlsruhe University of Applied Sciences prepares you for a business career in internationally operating companies.
Students of the Computer Science programme at Heidelberg University focus on the planning, modelling, design and implementation of complex software and hardware systems and processes.

The six-semester bachelor's degree in "International Information Systems Management" at University of Bamberg has been supplementing the existing courses offered by the Faculty of Information Systems and Applied Computer Science (WIAI) since the 2010/2011 winter semester.
In the Bachelor's degree programme Business Management you will acquire practical and intercultural skills to gain a foothold in internationally operating companies.
Germany.UniversityName: SRH Fernhochschule - The Distance Learning University

Germany.Description: This bi-national Internationales Management (Management International) programme from Berlin School of Economics and Law is provided as a combined Bachelor’s/ Master’s degree programme which does not permit transfer – the prerequisite of admission to the Master’s programme is completion of the Bachelor’s degree programme.
Germany.UniversityName: Berlin School of Economics and Law

Germany.Description: A unique combination that combines a broad business administration degree with specific knowledge of international business administration. With the International Business course, you study in German and two foreign languages and can work worldwide in all areas of business administration and international management.
Join our 4-year degree which includes an introductory year meant to offer the basic skills needed to successfully complete our main Business Marketing programme.

Germany.Programs: Business Management (Human Resource Management) with Foundation Year (Hons)
Germany.Description: If you don’t feel ready yet to start a full degree, this programme offers an extra year of studies that provides the support needed for completing the full Business BA in HRM.
The 3-year bachelor’s program of Mechanical Engineering (International) taught at Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT) aims to prepare future engineers for a successful career.
Start preparing for a career in Tourism without any previous experience by attending our 4-year programme including an introductory year meant to get you up to speed.

The Illustration BA programme from SRH Berlin University of Applied Sciences will teach you to visualise messages and draft blueprints while developing your personal style. Learn to apply your drawing skills in a professional context.
Germany.UniversityName: SRH Berlin University of Applied Sciences

Germany.Description: The international M.B.A. / Part-time / Online MBA Innovation and Entrepreneurship (Online) program from IU International University of Applied Sciences Online prepares students for a career in an international environment in Online.

The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus Strategic Digital Marketing program from Arden University, Study Center Berlin prepares students for a career in an international environment in Berlin, Germany.

The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus Computer Science (On-Campus) program from IU International University of Applied Sciences prepares students for a career in an international environment in Berlin, Germany.

The international M.Eng. / Full-time, Part-time / On Campus Computer Science program from Gisma University of Applied Sciences prepares students for a career in an international environment in Berlin, Germany.

Germany.UniversityName: MBA and Engineering Life Science Management
Germany.Description: The international M.B.A. / Full-time / On Campus MBA and Engineering Life Science Management program from HTW Berlin prepares students for a career in an international environment in Berlin, Germany.

The international M.Sc. / Full-time, Part-time / Online Strategic Business Management Online program from The University of Law Business School Online prepares students for a career in an international environment in Online.
The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus Applied Computer Science program from SRH University Wilhelm Löhe prepares students for a career in an international environment in Fürth, Germany.

The international M.B.A. / Full-time, Part-time / On Campus Technology Management program from NIT Northern Institute of Technology Management in cooperation with the Hamburg University of Technology (TUHH) prepares students for a career in an international environment in Hamburg, Germany.

The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus Optics and Photonics program from Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT) prepares students for a career in an international environment in Karlsruhe, Germany.

Germany.UniversityName: Global Technology and Innovation Management & Entrepreneurship
Germany.Description: The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus Global Technology and Innovation Management & Entrepreneurship program from Hamburg University of Technology prepares students for a career in an international environment in Hamburg, Germany.

The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus Sustainability and Transformation Management program from Fresenius University of Applied Sciences prepares students for a career in an international environment in Multiple locations.

The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus Business Management - Digital Marketing (On Campus) program from Steinbeis Next prepares students for a career in an international environment in Berlin, Germany.

The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus Strategic Management and Consulting program from CBS International Business School prepares students for a career in an international environment in Multiple locations.

The international M.Sc. / Full-time / On Campus International Management program from Kühne Logistics University (KLU) prepares students for a career in an international environment in Hamburg, Germany.
